_description: Configuration for loop modeling using PyRosetta loop reconstruction protocol

_parameter_descriptions.loop_start: Starting residue number of the loop (required)
_parameter_descriptions.loop_end: Ending residue number of the loop (required)
_parameter_descriptions.trajectories: Number of loop modeling trajectories to run
_parameter_descriptions.cycles_low: Number of cycles for centroid (low-resolution) stage
_parameter_descriptions.cycles_high: Number of cycles for fullatom (high-resolution) stage
_parameter_descriptions.temperature: Monte Carlo temperature (kT) for acceptance criterion

long_loop.description: Model a long loop (16 residues) with more sampling

thorough_modeling.description: Thorough loop modeling for difficult cases
